allSuccessStories.title: Success Story 25

allSuccessStories.content:
Hi Swati,
I have some good news! I don't know about other success stories of iitiimshaadi..but here is one! And it's my own :) I found my partner on your portal and we connected/met online in nov,14. I live in Nigeria and was struggling to find the right person for the past many years. But after we spoke and got to know each other I came over to India in March and got engaged! The wedding is planned for the 18th of June,15. We are both really excited and thank the iitiimshaadi team for putting us together! Hitching us essentially:) We don't feel that this is an arranged marriage..we found love online! All the very best to your team to put more hearts together! Cheers!
